doctitle.textblock: Missouri; Amendment to Notice of a Major Disaster Declaration

summary.textblock: This notice amends the notice of a major disaster for the State of Missouri, (FEMA-1006-DR), dated December 1, 1993, and related determinations.

further.textblock: Pauline C. Campbell, Response and Recovery Directorate, Federal Emergency Management Agency, Washington, DC 20472, (202) 646-3606.

supplem.textblock: The notice of a major disaster for the State of Missouri dated December 1, 1993, is hereby amended to include the following area among those areas determined to have been adversely affected by the catastrophe declared a major disaster by the President in his declaration of Missouri:
(Catalog of Federal Domestic Assistance No. 83.516, Disaster Assistance)

signjob.textblock: Associate Director, Response and Recovery Directorate.
